title: Antonio Tejero, leader of failed 1981 coup in Spain, dies at 93
summary_full: The revolt inspired fear that Francoist fascism had returned. Mr. Tejero died the same day the Spanish government declassified documents related to the coup.
summary_public: The revolt inspired fear that Francoist fascism had returned. Mr. Tejero died the same day the Spanish government declassified documents related to the coup.

ES.label: positive
ES.evidence: failed 1981 coup in Spain, dies at 93
